pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, November 30, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the debate on the Address in Reply to the Speech from the Throne.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Secretary-General of the United Nations, António Guterres.
